definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go astray, commit sin or error (‖[[שׁגה ]], [[שׁוג]]);—

sin ignorantly, inadvertently, Le 5:18, Nu 15:28 (P), cf. Ps 119:67.—[[בְּשַׁגׇּם]] Ge 6:3 perhaps Inf. cstr. sf., by reason of their going astray, v. Ges:§ 67 p Ew Dr al.; > Vrss for that he also is flesh. [[אֲבִישַׁג]], v. p. 4:b.
